entries.drink: Assam Milk Tea with Honey Boba
entries.note: Refreshing and not too creamy. 7 Leaves has one of the better black milk teas.

entries.drink: Red Ruby Milk Tea with Boba
entries.note: Good tea flavor, boba is chewy and has nice flavor too. Strong caffeine
Comes with boba and lychee jelly. Made with syrup but is super refreshing and has good flavor.
Has a milkier taste but tea flavor is still there. Used to be pretty good but quality worsened recently.
Tea flavor is obvious and fruit flavor is super refreshing. Drink is kind of expensive..

entries.drink: Passion Fruit Green Tea with QQ Noodles
entries.note: Supposedly part of the franchise that invented boba! They have QQ noodles which is a clear, chewy, noodle-shaped topping.
